Magoichi!He is one of my favorite samurais.
"Shirikue Magoichi" by Shiba Ryotaro is the best novel on him I've 
ever read.

I know one website devoted to him.One problem is it is in Japanese 
only.

http://www.iris.dti.ne.jp/~min30-3/



>   By the way, I've got a question of my own: Does anyone know where 
I can 
> find out more about Saiga (or Saigo) Magoichi?
> 
> Later.
